markdownRemark.excerpt: No.  We do not facilitate refunds because we offer the option of using Trafikito for free for any period of time. So you should only buy a paid plan only whenâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: No. We do not facilitate refunds because we offer the option of using Trafikito for free for any period of time. So you should only buy a paid plan only when you are sure you need it.
